description:
想在英语六级考试中拿到高分，必然要先写好作文。为了方便同学们复习写作部分，我们继续为大家提供一些常用词的高级替换形式，大家可以根据情况运用到作文中。

重要的(important)

vital【例】She had found out some information of vital importance。她已经发现了一些至关重要的信息。

crucial【例】It is crucial that the problem is tackled immediately。立即着手解决这个问题是至关重要的。

prominent【例】This considerable increase in investment played a prominent role in fueling economic growth。投资的较大幅度增加，对拉动经济增长发挥了明显作用。

cardinal【例】Respect for life is a cardinal principle of English law。尊重生命是英国法律最重要的原则。

优秀的(good)

excellent【例】She has always had a high reputation for her excellent short stories。她一直因其优秀的短篇小说享有很高的声望。

outstanding【例】The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding。得奖学金的女孩是相当优秀的。

extraordinary【例】Her strength of will was extraordinary。她的意志力是非凡的。

remarkable【例】The economic diplomacy of China is characterized by distinctive features and remarkable achievements。中国的经济外交具有鲜明的特点和卓越的成就。

有趣的(interesting)

amusing【例】Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing。只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

entertaining【例】This is an entertaining yet thought-provoking film。这部电影令人捧腹，却又发人深省。

engaging【例】His engaging personality made him popular with his peers。他迷人的个性使他深受同龄人的喜爱。

有活力的(energetic)

dynamic【例】South Asia continues to be the most dynamic economic region in the world。南亚仍然是世界上最具活力的经济区。

vigorous【例】We urge vigorous action to be taken immediately。我们强烈要求立即采取有力措施。

animated【例】His observations gave rise to an animated and lively discussion。他的言论引起了一场气氛热烈而活跃的讨论。
